item.title: HxpCTF2022-Web
item.description: 太菜了，哭哭 valentine 源码审计。一个简单的JS var express = require('express'); var bodyParser = require('body-parser') const crypto = require("crypto"); var path = require('path'); const fs = require('fs'); var app = express(); viewsFolder = path.join(__dirname, 'views'); if (!fs.existsSync(viewsFolder)) { fs.mkdirSync(viewsFolder); } app.set('views', viewsFolder); app.set('view engine', 'ejs'); app.use(bodyParser.urlencoded({ extended: false })) app.post('/template', function (req, res) { let tmpl = req.body.tmpl;
